PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 5 The initial PCE reached 3.6% 6 in a typical BHJ device and has been subsequently improved to exceeding 6% by BHJ layer thickness optimization and nanomorphology control using mixed solvent mixtures.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| initial PCE |
| BHJ device |
| BHJ layer thickness |
| nanomorphology |
| mixed solvent mixtures |

Explanation:

* "initial PCE" is a property name referring to the initial Power Conversion Efficiency in a Bulk Heterojunction (BHJ) device.
* "BHJ device" is a property name referring to the type of photovoltaic device.
* "BHJ layer thickness" is a property name referring to the thickness of the active layer in a BHJ device.
* "nanomorphology" is a property name referring to the structure of the nanoscale materials in the BHJ layer.
* "mixed solvent mixtures" is a property name referring to the solvents used in the processing of the BHJ layer.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| initial PCE |
| BHJ layer thickness |
| nanomorphology |

Explanation:

* "initial PCE" is a material property referring to the initial Power Conversion Efficiency in a Bulk Heterojunction (BHJ) device.
* "BHJ layer thickness" is a material property referring to the thickness of the active layer in a BHJ device.
* "nanomorphology" is a material property referring to the structure of the nanoscale materials in the BHJ layer.

Entities removed:

* "BHJ device" is not a material property, it is a type of photovoltaic device.
* "mixed solvent mixtures" is not a material property, it is a processing technique used in the fabrication of the BHJ layer.
